body.raw:
Welcome to my brand new personal website! This was a bit of an experiment to test some newer technologies and to improve my skills overall as a developer
and as an engineer.

In here you'll find some posts from me that I've aptly titled **journal entries**.

Happy reading!
body.html:
Welcome to my brand new personal website! This was a bit of an experiment to test some newer technologies and to improve my skills overall as a developer and as an engineer.

In here you'll find some posts from me that I've aptly titled journal entries.

Happy reading!
